name: Identity (itch) (Ganius Games)
description:
Controls:

- WASD / Arrows : Move

- Press ‘F’ when you want to detach the box.

You are part of a hive sentient robot clone race. But you developed a consciousness and now have to disable your clones that you are connected to. All the moves you make, the clones make the inversely opposite moves.

You have to work around that to meet the clones and disable the clones manually so you can no longer be connected to them. If the clone dies, you die as well, so along with protecting yourself, you have to protect the clone as well.

You can push and pull boxes that don’t have any specific direction indicated on them. And you can only push directional-boxes in the direction they are indicating.

Just touching the box will attach the box to the player. Press ‘F’ when you want to detach the box.

Programs Used:

Unity

Aseprite
